articles.title: Adobe adds Product Support Agent for AI-assisted troubleshooting
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Adobe introduced a new AI-powered Product Support Agent designed to simplify troubleshooting and support case management within the Adobe Experience Platform. This agent is intended to help in managing customer experiences.

articles.title: Kling AI Celebrates First Anniversary; Achieves Annualized Revenue Run Rate Surpassing USD100 Million in 10th Month Since Launch
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Kuaishou Technology's Kling AI, a large video generation model, achieved an annualized revenue run rate exceeding USD100 million within ten months of its launch. Kuaishou rolled out Kling AI 2.0 in April 2025 and debuted Kling AI 2.1 model series in May 2025, featuring standard and high-quality modes with enhanced cost-effectiveness and motion performance.

articles.title: 47 Convenient Products You Wish You Knew About Years Ago
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly introduced products such as SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes for excessive sweating, Windex outdoor glass cleaner for streak-free cleaning, and Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo with keratin for hair cleaning and frizz reduction. Additionally, it features Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads for skin exfoliation and Snug Plugs for loose outlets, showcasing a diverse range of problem-solving products.

articles.title: This announcement that shares the competition
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, aiming to redefine the foldable smartphone market. The device is rumored to feature a 200-megapixel main camera, an enlarged inner screen, and a cutting-edge processor optimized for AI performance. This launch aims to solidify Samsung's leadership in foldable smartphones and force competitors to reassess their ambitions.

articles.title: Free yourself from summer chores with Dreame's Z1 Pro pool cleaner
articles.author: Dreame
articles.summary: A robotic pool cleaner is available. It is offered with a 50% discount.

articles.title: Superstore next landmark commercial store on Tsuut'ina Nation, breaks ground
articles.author: Hiren Mansukhani
articles.summary: Loblaw is launching a new Canadian Superstore in Tsuut'ina Nation by 2026. The Superstore will be located in the Taza development and aims to attract more visitors to the area.  The outlet will be the first to be set up on Indigenous land in Alberta and will have a facade tailored for the community.

articles.title: How to Increase Storage Space on Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo is upgrading the handheld console market with the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: The products that will stand up to the Israeli heat
articles.summary: Dove is launching new antiperspirant spray and roll-on deodorants with Talco and Aloe Vera and Rose Water fragrances, offering 72-hour sweat protection and Pro-Ceramide technology. AXE is expanding its premium line with Black Vanilla and Purple Patchouli scents, crafted by perfumers and providing long-lasting freshness. Badin is introducing a new fragrance collection for laundry products inspired by boutique hotels, featuring Sweet Royal, Elegance Care, and Luxurious Touch scents.

articles.title: Amazon's having a secret sale on Kodak's new outdoor mini projector just in time for ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Kodak released the new Luma 500 Mini Projector in early May. Amazon is currently holding its first sale on the Kodak Luma 500 Mini Projector.

articles.title: Save £25 on Ninja air fryer rated nearly 5 stars in limited time Amazon deal
articles.author: Ambarish Awale
articles.summary: The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone Digital Air Fryer is a versatile 7.6L air fryer with two independent cooking drawers and 6-in-1 functions (air frying, max crisp, roasting, baking, reheating, and dehydrating). It is currently available on Amazon and praised for cooking two dishes at once with different settings.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launched on Thursday
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 in the U.S. on Thursday, June 5. The Switch 2 will cost $450.

articles.title: How to upgrade Dad's grooming game for Father's Day
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Walgreens is introducing a "Men's Zone" in nearly 8,000 stores and online, featuring new men's grooming and skincare products. The zone includes brands like Harry's, Dr. Squatch, Cremo, and Mando offering options such as body washes, deodorants, and soaps perfect for Father's Day gifting.

articles.title: Iconic astronaut beverage gets new life as energy, exercise drink
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: General Mills' Tang is re-entering the U.S. market as a pre-workout sports supplement, partnering with An Supps (Applied Nutrition PLC). The revamped Tang product line includes carbonated ready-to-drink beverages and powders in pre-workout, caffeine-free pre-workout, and hydration formulas, available at The Vitamin Shoppe.

articles.title: Iconic astronaut beverage makes energy drink comeback
articles.author: The Street
articles.summary: General Mills' Tang, in partnership with An Supps, is launching new pre-workout and hydration products aimed at fitness enthusiasts. The new Tang variations include carbonated ready-to-drink canned beverages and powders in pre-workout, caffeine-free pre-workout, and hydration formulas, available initially at The Vitamin Shoppe.

articles.title: New Swagbucks Swag Code valid from 5-7 pm ET on June 5
articles.author: WRAL
articles.summary: Swagbucks, a rewards website, is offering a new member bonus sign-up code, SMARTSHOP, for new users. This code provides bonus SB points upon registration at Swagbucks.com. Users can earn SB points through various online activities and redeem them for gift cards.

articles.title: Fluffy Fluffy Sets Global Flagship in Manhattan, Redefining the All-Day Café Experience  Jun. 5, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy is launching its new flagship store in Manhattan, NY, on June 21-22. The store features a dedicated cocktail bar and offers signature soufflé pancakes, along with opening weekend promotions. Guests can enjoy a complimentary drink with any pancake purchase on Day 1 and receive a free slice of cheesecake or cheese tart with pancake purchase on Day 2.

articles.title: Instacart slashes prices for a surprising reason
articles.author: Cody Kline
articles.summary: Instacart launched a new national campaign called "Summer Like It's 1999," aimed at attracting Millennial shoppers by slashing prices on classic summer snacks like Capri Sun and Otter Pops. The campaign, running through September 5, offers discounts up to 47.2% based on the CPI change between 1999 and now and is intended to create an emotional connection and increase value perception for shoppers.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 1st impressions: can an Android tablet finally replace my laptop?
articles.author: Mark Kavanagh
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus Pad 3, a flagship tablet featuring a 13.2-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and up to 16GB of RAM. The OnePlus Pad 3 is available for purchase at OnePlus.com, with prices starting at €599. Accessories like the Stylo, Smart Keyboard, and folio case are also available for purchase.

articles.title: Struggling car company swiftly shuts down half its stores
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: VinFast is scaling back its Canadian retail operations, closing half of its 10 corporate-owned stores. The company is making this move, two and a half years after entering the country, due to a challenging EV market, shifting away from the direct-to-consumer model.

articles.title: The CEO of Walmart's drone partner says shoppers are ordering eggs to test the technology's handling
articles.summary: Wing, in collaboration with Walmart, is significantly expanding its drone delivery service to 100 additional US stores across various metro areas. This expansion aims to provide faster delivery of everyday items like groceries and household supplies, with Wing reporting an average delivery time of under 19 minutes.

articles.title: The CEO of Walmart's drone partner says shoppers are ordering eggs to test the technology's handling
articles.author: Dominick Reuter
articles.summary: Walmart and Wing are expanding their drone delivery service to 100 more US stores across metro areas, including Atlanta, Charlotte, Houston, Orlando, and Tampa. The companies are also expanding in the Dallas-Fort Worth market. Wing's drones have a payload of five pounds, and the average delivery time is under 19 minutes.

articles.title: It's Happened: AI Just Replaced Sales Jobs – and This UK Agency Made It Happen
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Marketing Web Development Agency launched a generative AI sales agent designed to engage, qualify, and convert leads without human intervention. This AI agent is capable of answering detailed service questions, guiding potential customers, and replicating the style of a company founder or top salesperson, making it deployable across various industries.

articles.title: Amazon launches new R&D group focused on agentic AI and robotics
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.summary: Amazon plans to launch a new group focused on agentic AI within its consumer product division. This group will be based out of Lab126 and aims to develop an agentic AI framework for the company's robotics efforts.

articles.title: Futuri Adds Video To AI-Powered Ad Sales Platform
articles.author: RBR-TVBR
articles.summary: Futuri has launched SpotOn Video, a new AI-powered video creation platform within its SpotOn platform. This allows ad executives to create short-form, branded video spots instantly. SpotOn Video aims to enhance sales proposals and showcase campaign ideas for social, digital, or streaming platforms.

articles.title: Nutella unveils its first-ever new flavor in 60 years: Here's when it will hit U.S. shelves
articles.author: Bhavika Rathore
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching a new Peanut Nutella flavor, the first new flavor in six decades, exclusively in the United States by spring 2026. Ferrero will invest $75 million in its Franklin Park plant in the US to produce the new product.

articles.title: NextGen Digital Expands Cloud AI Hosting & Digital Infrastructure Operations & Provides Corporate Update  Jun. 5, 2025 19:30
articles.summary: NextGen Digital Platforms Inc. has expanded its "Cloud AI Hosting" service by adding three new computing workstations equipped with Nvidia GPUs, bringing the total to five. This expansion is intended to increase operational cash flows and cater to the growing demand in the artificial intelligence computing sector. The company aims to further build a larger fleet of GPUs for its Cloud AI Hosting service.

articles.title: New Brick 'Food Hall' Answers Eternal Question Of What's For Dinner
articles.author: Karen Wall
articles.summary: Wonder is launching a new "food hall" service in Brick Township, NJ, described as a "mealtime super app operating a collection of delivery-first restaurants." The location features a variety of restaurants available for delivery, pick-up, or limited dining-in options. For every order sold during opening week, Wonder will donate $1 to the Community Food Bank of NJ and Fulfill Monmouth & Ocean County.

articles.title: BrandSpark and Newsweek Celebrate Brands Prevailing Amidst Economic Uncertainty
articles.author: Katherine Fung
articles.summary: The BrandSpark awards recognized Hershey's and Reese's flavors of One Brands Protein Bars, Easy Healthcare Corporation's Premom Premium Prenatal Vitamins, Jiffy Lube's updated service offerings, and BIC lighters safety updates. These awards celebrate the introduction or updates made to the products and services offered by these companies, highlighting their efforts to innovate and meet consumer needs.

articles.title: A Bunch Of Switch 2 Consoles Are Showing Up With Free Pringles And Coke
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, with some pre-orders via Walmart arriving early. Some customers who received the console early also received a bottle of Coke and Pringles.

articles.title: Here's 6 things to do for the weekend of June 6
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 is launching. Further details about the launch of the Nintendo Switch 2 are available in the full article.

articles.title: 9 Best Toner Pads for Glowing Skin, Tested and Reviewed 2025
articles.author: Jenifer Calle
articles.summary: Peter Thomas Roth launched exfoliating toner pads with salicylic and glycolic acid. Innisfree introduced gentle retinol salicylic daily toner pads. Biodance released sea kelp gel toner pads, and Needly offers daily toner pads with BHA, PHA, allantoin, centella asiatica extract, and tea tree leaf extract.

articles.title: Unilever's Esi Eggleston Bracey on AI, Consumer Evolution, and Cannes Lions
articles.author: Jenny Rooney
articles.summary: Unilever is transforming its marketing approach to personalized messages at scale, embracing AI for amplification. Awin introduces tailored influencer management solutions with partnerships across CreatorIQ, LTK, and ShopMy. This aims to help brands to maximize their influencer marketing potential.

articles.title: Boden shoppers feel 'confident' in 'striking' summer dress reduced in sale
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Boden is offering its Sofia Trim Jersey Midi Dress, originally priced at £98, on sale for £68.60. The dress features a fit and flare design, side seam pockets, and a detachable belt, and is made from a cotton and TENCEL blend. New Look is also selling a Pink Floral Print Ruffle Trim Midi Dress for £34.99.

articles.title: Tanka Launches at TechCrunch Sessions: AI, Claiming to be Startups' 'AI Co-Founder'
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Kisson Lin, a former Meta and TikTok entrepreneur, launched Tanka, an AI-powered collaboration tool on June 5, 2025. Tanka integrates with existing tech stacks and provides features such as memory transfer, AI smart replies, landing page generation, and presentation drafting. The platform aims to help startups maintain clarity and speed as they scale.

articles.title: Ventura Foods® Brings Innovation to Foodservice Mayonnaise
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Ventura Foods introduced its new MayoNeeds™ Framework, designed to streamline mayonnaise selection for culinary professionals by aligning formulations with specific culinary applications. This framework aims to reduce confusion and improve the matching of mayonnaise products to customer needs, benefiting both chefs and operators in the foodservice industry.

articles.title: Fans get in line, long lines, for highly anticipated launch of the Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Switch 2 is launching as an upgrade to its eight-year-old predecessor. The product launch happened on June 5, 2025.

articles.title: Fans around the world queue up in long lines for the highly anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 launch
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Switch 2 is launching as an upgrade to its eight-year-old predecessor. The product launch was on June 5, 2025.

articles.title: Hyssop Beauty Apothecary Sponsors Nutley Family Service Bureau's Rock Hunger VIII
articles.summary: Hyssop Beauty Apothecary launched the Phyto-Retinol Complex Youth Renewal Serum. This serum is a gentle alternative to retinol, rich in Vitamin A, and aims to revitalize skin for a more youthful appearance by promoting cell turnover, improving visible signs of aging, and refining skin texture. It is to be used nightly before moisturizing.

articles.title: Can I play Switch 2 games on my Switch 1?
articles.author: Claire Lewis
articles.summary: Nintendo launched its new console Switch 2 with a few launch titles.  While most Switch 2 games are exclusive to the new console, Deltarune Chapters 1-4, is also available to play on the original Nintendo Switch for $24.99. This allows users without the new Switch 2 to get in on some of the new game action.

articles.title: Seedtag Unveils Neuro-Contextual Advertising
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Seedtag has launched neuro-contextual advertising, powered by its AI, Liz, which interprets user interest, emotion, and intent to improve campaign performance across various platforms.  This new technology moves beyond traditional contextual advertising by understanding how people think and engage with content, enabling more effective and targeted marketing strategies. Seedtag clients can access Liz through an intuitive interface, transforming it into a strategic collaborator by querying competitive positioning, audience resonance, contextual alignment and more.

articles.title: Sponsored Content: Start Your Heavy Equipment Career with Carolina Equipment Training's 12-Day Program
articles.author: Hannah Ross
articles.summary: Retailers are offering the Nintendo Switch 2, making it accessible to consumers.

articles.title: Nigeria: Tradift's Ai-Powered Tool Eliminate Digital Barriers for SMEs, Builds E-Commerce Stores in Seconds
articles.author: Juliet Umeh
articles.summary: Tradift, a Nigerian SaaS platform, has launched a new AI-powered feature that enables users to create personalized e-commerce stores quickly. The tool personalizes stores based on business type, audience, and regional preferences. This launch aims to democratize digital access for small and medium businesses across Africa.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Rolls Out In India Starting At ₹54,999
articles.summary: OnePlus's new device weighs 185 gm and measures 150.8 x 71.7 x 8.2 mm. It features a glass front, aluminium alloy chassis, dual Nano-SIM support, and an IP65 rating for dust and water spray protection.

articles.title: What to know about the much-anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 on launch day
articles.author: MAE ANDERSON
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 on Thursday. This launch occurred eight years after the release of the original Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 'compact' $800 robot vacuum and mop for $460, and shoppers say it has 'great suction power'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Roborock Qrevo S Robot Vacuum and Mop for sale. This new product is designed to help users clean floors effectively.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s compact flagship launched in India at ₹54,999,
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13s in India, a compact flagship smartphone priced from ₹54,999, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, AMOLED display, and 80W fast charging. The company also introduced the OnePlus Pad 3, a flagship tablet with a 13.2-inch display, also powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, with pricing details to be announced later.

articles.title: Vectorworks Launches New AI Assistant (Preview) Built for Designers
articles.author: Vectorworks
articles.summary: Vectorworks is introducing the AI Assistant (Preview), an intelligent tool accessible through the Help menu and Home Screen, designed to provide quick, context-aware answers to user questions. The AI Assistant offers features such as confidence scores, language localization, and built-in feedback to improve user experience and support.

articles.title: NexusTek Brings Advanced Managed and Professional Services to the Azure Marketplace
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NexusTek has launched its managed and professional IT services on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. These services cover hybrid infrastructure, DevOps, data and AI, cybersecurity, and IT staffing. These services support Microsoft Azure Consumption Commitment (MACC) agreements.

articles.title: I Can Go Five Days Without Picking Up a Razor Thanks to This $199 Laser Hair Device
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: The Nood Flasher 2.0 is an at-home laser hair removal device that uses IPL technology to reduce hair growth. After eight weeks of testing, the reviewer noted a significant reduction in hair growth and coarseness, with shaving frequency decreasing from daily to once every two weeks. The device, priced at $199, is recommended for those seeking to reduce shaving time and are willing to commit to consistent treatments, however, it doesn't offer permanent hair removal.

articles.title: Canva brings Magic Design AI to mobile, making quick design possible on the go
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Canva has launched its Magic Design AI feature on mobile devices, which was previously available only on desktop. This tool allows users to generate design options from short prompts or uploaded images, enabling them to create ready-to-use graphics directly from their smartphones. The mobile version of Magic Design AI is included in Canva's free plan.

articles.title: Ethical Web AI Launches AI Vault SaaS on AWS Marketplace
articles.author: Ethical Web AI
articles.summary: Bubblr Inc., operating as Ethical Web AI, has launched AI Vault SaaS on the AWS Marketplace. This new SaaS version of AI Vault simplifies deployment and broadens market access. AI Vault Enterprise, the company's initial offering, required integration into a client's AWS environment.

articles.title: Nintendo sells out Switch 2 console at global launch 任天堂Switch 2全球发售即售罄
articles.summary: Nintendo launched Switch 2 globally. Analysts consider Switch 2 a catalyst for video game industry growth.

articles.title: Nintendo sells out Switch 2 console at global launch
articles.author: David Keohane
articles.summary: Nintendo launched its Switch 2 console globally. This long-awaited console is more powerful and sleeker than its predecessor, featuring new capabilities and upgraded controllers. It aims to drive the next wave of growth in the video game industry, building upon the success of the original Switch.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 is finally here with a new Mario Kart game
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the new Nintendo Switch, which is available for $449.99. The product is expected to sell out quickly due to high pre-order demand and limited retail availability.

articles.title: Chinese solar products - UGH!!
articles.summary: The makers of Abracadabra and Coppersmith frying pans are introducing "ChinaYouGoNow!!!!!!", an 8-page booklet for $29.99 (plus fees) providing tips to avoid robo-calls and other privacy intrusions. This American-based service aims to provide security and beat 'Chi-cons'.

articles.title: Real Estate Minute – 06-05-2025
articles.author: Chris Burton
articles.summary: Retailers are preparing to offer the Nintendo Switch 2 to consumers.

articles.title: I think Nintendo played it very safe with Switch 2 - but that's not a bad thing
articles.author: Jake Brigstock
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2 worldwide, which is an upgrade to the original Switch. The Switch 2 includes new features such as a bigger screen, better performance, 4K resolution, increased internal storage (256GB), improved Joy-Cons, and a new GameChat feature. It also maintains backwards compatibility with most existing Switch games and the system's user interface is very similar to the original Switch.

articles.title: Canva brings Magic Design AI to mobile, making quick design possible on the go
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Canva launched its Magic Design AI feature on mobile devices. This feature allows users to create visual content directly from their smartphones and was previously available only on desktop.

articles.title: Sales for this anti-frizz hair product are skyrocketing on Amazon — here's why
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: Amika's The Shield Anti-Humidity Spray sales skyrocketed on Amazon. The spray protects hair from heat styling up to 450 degrees, has UV filters, and keeps frizz at bay for up to 24 hours. The formula contains sea buckthorn, which nourishes and strengthens hair and scalp.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 hype leads to shortages, special store opening hours
articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.summary: Nintendo launched its new console, the Switch 2, on Thursday amidst high fan excitement. The company hopes the new console will help sustain its stock rally, following the success of the original Switch, which sold over 152 million units. Strong demand is expected for the Switch 2.

articles.title: Android users can now access Photoshop Beta for free
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Adobe launched the Photoshop Beta for Android smartphones, providing users with free access to essential Photoshop tools like cropping, retouching, and layer editing without requiring a Creative Cloud subscription. Adobe plans to update the beta regularly based on user feedback, potentially challenging existing mobile editors and expanding its user base.

articles.title: Eve Lom luxury cleanser has been reduced to as little as £14
articles.author: Aimee Robinson
articles.summary: The Eve Lom cleanser is a balm cleanser used for makeup removal and cleansing. It features ingredients like clove, eucalyptus, hops, and chamomile and is applied using a muslin cloth. Eve Lom positions the cleanser as a luxurious skincare experience.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 2025 review: Not fast enough
articles.author: Nicholas Sutrich
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 2025, a new smartphone featuring a PANTONE-certified vegan leather back, IP68/IP69 water and dust resistance, and fast 68W charging. The phone will be available unlocked in the U.S. on June 5 at Best Buy, Amazon, and Motorola.com for $549.99, with T-Mobile and other carriers to follow.

articles.title: The best Father's Day gifts: 83 thoughtful ideas for £50 and under they'll actually want
articles.author: Charlie Allenby
articles.summary: Several companies are featured with product offerings suitable as gifts. Piggy's offers hot honey, and Delli presents a Daddy Cool box hamper. Monmouth Coffee provides a three-month coffee subscription service, and Chimac introduces kimchi ketchup. Grind offers a cold-brew coffee maker, Hip Pop features strawberry and pineapple kombucha.

articles.title: Google's Android redesign is available to some already – just check your Messages
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Google is introducing the Material 3 Expressive design language to Android, starting with updates to the Google Messages app. The update includes subtle changes like lozenge-shaped buttons and a redesigned '+' menu, providing an early glimpse into the broader Material 3 Expressive rollout. The extent of adoption by other Android brands like Motorola and Samsung remains to be seen.

articles.title: Shark HydroVac Pro XL review: A cordless wet-dry vacuum that gets almost everything right
articles.author: Camryn Rabideau
articles.summary: Shark introduced the HydroVac Pro XL Cordless, a 2-in-1 vac-mop designed for hard floor cleaning. The HydroVac Pro XL has a cordless design that automatically dispenses cleaning solution and scrubs floors. It is designed for cleaning spills, stains, and everyday dirt off hard flooring. It retails for $200.

articles.title: New frontiers of brand storytelling: Why the NewFronts matter more than ever
articles.author: Amy Lanzi
articles.summary: Walmart launched a 23-part holiday rom-com series, 'Add to Heart,' across multiple platforms, enabling viewers to shop featured products directly from the episodes. Sephora created a three-part docuseries, 'Faces of Music,' showcasing the brand's artistic side and celebrating individuality through beauty rituals. These examples demonstrate a trend of brands creating their own content to engage audiences and drive business outcomes.

articles.title: Globant Reimagines Traditional IT Services with AI Pods, the First Subscription Model for AI-Powered Engineering
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Globant has introduced AI Pods, a new subscription model for AI-powered services like engineering, product definition, design, and testing. AI Pods offer agentic AI orchestrated and supervised by Globant experts, providing scalable solutions with faster time to market and lower costs. The service is powered by Globant Enterprise AI (GEAI) platform.

articles.title: Grimoire Launches with Sustainable, Luxury-Grade Skincare
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Vincent Branchesi launched a new skincare brand focused on restoring and reviving skin with clinically-proven products. The brand's formulas combine clean, high-potency encapsulated ingredients. Vincent Branchesi's products address the realities of modern life, targeting issues like sun exposure, stress, jetlag, and late nights.

articles.title: 4 Laundry Detergents That Come in Plastic-Free Packaging (And What We Think of Them)
articles.summary: The laundry industry is minimizing waste by introducing detergents with plastic-free packaging, including liquid detergents in metal bottles, powder detergents in cardboard boxes, and solid detergent tiles. While laundry detergent sheets are deemed ineffective, solid detergent tiles show promise, with a fragrance-free version soon to be released.

articles.title: Nectar Social Raises $10.6M to Close the Social-to-Revenue Gap for Disruptor Brands
articles.author: Nectar Social
articles.summary: Nectar Social, an AI-powered social commerce platform, has launched with $10.6 million in funding. The platform unifies social listening and community management and attributes revenue to organic engagement.

articles.title: Xnurta Unveils AI Reporting Agent to Accelerate Speed-to-Insight for Amazon Ads
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xnurta, an AI advertising platform, launched the Xnurta AI Reporting Agent on June 5, 2025. This new offering expands their AI-powered services.

articles.title: Cleo+Coco Cracks the Code on Clean, High-Performance Personal Care Products with Nationwide Whole Foods Market Launch
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cleo+Coco has launched its deodorants and body care products nationwide at Whole Foods Market. The launch coincides with the brand's evolution, including redesigned premium packaging and a revamped website. The product line features a 'Super Formula' with five natural odor-fighting ingredients and uses sustainable packaging.

articles.title: Observe.AI Unveils AI Agents for Voice of Customer Intelligence
articles.summary: Observe.AI has expanded its GenAI Insights offering with new capabilities that unlock voice of customer insights accessible across the enterprise through AI agents. The latest release allows Observe.AI customers to gain granular insights from 100% of customer conversations, including sentiment shifts and reasons for customer outreach, tied to business outcomes. This expansion aims to democratize access to customer data and enable faster decisions at scale.

articles.title: Chinese app firm Newborn Town sets up global HQ in Hong Kong for AI work, overseas push
articles.author: Hannah Wang
articles.summary: Newborn Town is establishing a global headquarters and an AI research center in Hong Kong to expand its overseas presence. The company will focus on developing AI applications for social entertainment and leveraging Hong Kong's business environment and talent pool for this new research center.

articles.title: Observe.AI Unveils AI Agents for Voice of Customer Intelligence
articles.author: Observe.AI
articles.summary: Observe.AI has expanded its GenAI Insights offering with new capabilities like AskObserve, a natural language AI agent, and AI Studio, a no-code command center. These additions provide deeper visibility into customer interactions and democratize access to customer intelligence across an enterprise, allowing smarter and faster decisions at scale. The aim is to provide every team access to deeper, smarter, evidence-based insights that drive business action.

articles.title: Woofz: Interview With Founder & CEO Natalia Shahmetova About The Dog Training App Company
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Woofz, a dog training app, is planning to launch the first wave of AI-driven insights, including longevity-focused health data pulled from wearables, in 2025. They are also developing a predictive Healthy Dashboard, aiming to be the 'Apple Health' for dogs, which is intended to proactively help pet parents manage their dog's health.

articles.title: Shopping Got Smarter—Can AI Finally Fix Fashion Fails?
articles.summary: GlanceAI launched in the U.S. and attracted over 1.5 million users by generating personalized outfits based on uploaded photos. The app focuses on everyday wearability from brands like Zara, Levi's, and Mango. Other smart shopping tools mentioned are Beni, a browser extension for secondhand options, and Croissant, which displays guaranteed resale prices.

articles.title: R/GA launches global AI Products team to drive creative and commercial innovation
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: R/GA has launched a dedicated global AI Products team to build proprietary AI tools and platforms. This team, led by Ben Cooper and backed by R/GA's $50M Innovation Fund, aims to unlock new creative and commercial opportunities for brands. The team will develop AI products ranging from predictive personalization to generative interfaces.

articles.title: 31 'Internet Famous' Products With Amazing Results
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Amazon features several newly popular beauty and personal care products in its "Internet Famous" section. These include Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener available in four shades, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in PINK Honey, and E.l.f.'s Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, among others.

articles.title: Reddy Family and Bain Capital Announce Formation of Trillium Foods, Premium Liquid Food and Beverage Manufacturing Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Trillium Foods, a new liquid food and beverage company, has officially launched. The company offers dressings, sauces, mayonnaises, syrups, and beverage mixes for foodservice, retail, and food processing. Trillium Foods is majority-owned by the Reddy Family and backed by Bain Capital's Private Credit Group.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Debuts With Joy-Con 2 Controllers: Price, Features
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 on Thursday. The Nintendo Switch 2 is Nintendi's first brand-new gaming platform in eight years. Nintendo Switch 2 is the successor to the Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: The Nothing Phone 3 Has a Launch Date, but I'm Not Sure the Price Is Right
articles.author: Jake Peterson
articles.summary: Nothing is known for offering value-driven phones like the Nothing Phone 3a, priced at $379. The company prioritizes essential features while maintaining a premium experience at a lower cost. The Nothing Phone 2 launched at $599, and the upcoming Nothing Phone 3 is anticipated.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 arrives with Snapdragon 8 Elite inside
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Pad 3, a new tablet featuring a 13.2-inch display and powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The tablet includes enhanced multitasking capabilities, file-sharing features with OnePlus phones, and O Plus Connect software for wireless file transfers. The Pad 3 is available for preorder, with prices starting at $699.99.

articles.title: Hoover HG4 Hydro review: This robot vacuum and mop made cleaning my floors easier
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: Hoover launched the HG4 Robot Vacuum and Mop, a hybrid cleaning device that combines vacuuming and mopping functions. The HG4 features app control, room mapping, and is designed for use on hard floors and carpets.  It offers automated cleaning and is positioned as a mid-range option, though setup can be complex for some users.

articles.title: Old Phone Collecting Dust? Put It to Work Watching Your
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Alfred is launching a security camera app that transforms old smartphones into DIY security cameras. The app offers features like remote viewing, motion detection, and cloud storage in its free version. Alfred also provides a premium upgrade with enhanced features like higher resolution and longer cloud storage.

articles.title: Jaffa Cakes unveil brand new flavour — but fans say 'not a chance'
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: McVities has launched a new limited-edition Jaffa Cakes flavor called Hot Honey, featuring a honey and chilli filling instead of the traditional orange jelly. The new product is currently available at Asda stores for £1.50 and will be released in other supermarkets and convenience stores at the end of July.

articles.title: 31 Products To Deal With Annoying Body Issues
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction and features of several new personal care and hygiene products. These include dark spot corrector soap bars, toe separators, a Listerine Pocketmist, tongue scrapers, Fur Oil for post-hair removal, Happy Nuts Comfort Cream, Carpe's Groin Women's Powder, Lume's whole body deodorant, SweatBlock wipes, Sol De Janeiro Rio Deo deodorant, piercing bump solution, First Aid Beauty's KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant, butt acne-clearing lotion, Truremedy Naturals Remedy Tea Tree Oil body wash, Mighty Patch Pimple Spot Treatment, cold sore patches, a callus remover, a nail renewal formula, earwax removal drops, an ear-washing bottle, anti-chafe balm, bra liners, anti-dandruff shampoo, Compound W One Step Pads, hypoallergenic body wipes, CeraVe's Renewing Salicylic Acid Cleanser, incontinence pads, deodorizer shoe spray, saline nasal gel, and a tonsil stone-removing kit.

articles.title: Instacart Brings Back the '90s with Big Savings and a Retro Makeover
articles.author: Pablo Urdiales Antelo
articles.summary: Instacart launched 'Summer Like It's 1999,' a special promotion offering discounts up to 47.2% on various items. Additionally, Instacart introduced Fizz, a new flat-rate delivery app designed for snacks and drinks aimed at users 21 and older. This app allows users to order items with a $5 delivery fee and is tailored to group orders and party planning.

articles.title: Nutella unveils first new flavor in 60 years, but there's a catch
articles.author: Newsroom
articles.summary: Ferrero's Nutella is launching Peanut Nutella in the United States in Spring 2026. Additionally, a vegan version of Nutella is being rolled out in UK supermarkets, swapping dairy for ingredients like chickpeas and rice syrup. Production of Peanut Nutella will take place in Illinois, with Ferrero investing $75 million in manufacturing.

articles.title: 8 Father's Day Gifts For The Entrepreneurial Dad Who's Never Off The Clock
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: Braun is offering a ProComfort shaver that handles even 7-day beards. NETGEAR introduces a mobile router delivering secure, fast 5G and WiFi 7 connectivity. Stephen Curry's premium bourbon features notes of toasted oak, vanilla, and warm spice. There is also a THC + CBD shot offering a functional alternative to alcohol.

articles.title: Aldi brings back the Big Daddy Burger to celebrate Father's Day for under a fiver
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Big Daddy Burger (£4.99, 710g) on June 12th for Father's Day. The kit contains a 100% British beef burger, American-style cheese sauce, crispy onions, brioche buns, and BBQ sauce. Aldi is also offering Specially Selected Extra Mature Gouda Holland Cheese (£3.19, 180g), Specially Selected Oven Cut Chips (£3.19, 1.5kg) and Specially Selected Back Bacon (£2.49, 240g) as accompaniments.

articles.title: If You're Not On TikTok But Want To See The Products Everyone Is Talking About, These 34 Are Actually Worth Your Time And Money
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream formulated with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Laneige released Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Dae launched Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. Oxo launched compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer to make cold brew in five minutes. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion. Touchland launched Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Ninja introduced a portable Crispi Air Fryer system.

articles.title: Nintendo set to sell out Switch 2 console at global launch
articles.author: David Keohane
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2. Several games are expected to be available at the launch of the new console.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 console first look: I tried it before it went on sale — ...
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2. Previews suggest the next-generation console is a worthwhile upgrade.

articles.title: From Laundress to Reinvention: Gwen Whiting's Journey in Building, Selling, and Relaunching a Cleaning Brand with Purpose
articles.summary: Gwen Whiting, founder of The Laundress, launched a new wellness-focused cleaning brand after her disillusionment with Unilever's handling of the former. The new brand emphasizes sustainability, eco-conscious packaging, and aromatherapy-infused products, offered through a members-only model, representing an introduction of new products and services in the cleaning industry.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 debuts with Snapdragon 8 Elite and 12,140mAh battery
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OnePlus launched its latest Android tablet, the OnePlus Pad 3. The tablet will be available for sale in Europe and North America starting June 5, with an India release planned for a later date. OnePlus states that the new tablet includes improvements.

articles.title: 21 Must-Have Parenting Products Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Maxi Cosi introduced the Kiskadee high chair with 360-degree rotation. Woddle launched a smart changing pad that tracks weight, has a night-light, warmer, noise machine, and app control. Baby Breeza offers an all-in-one food maker and steamer, along with the Formula Pro Advanced for automated formula preparation. Ayla & Co presented a stylish diaper bag, while Momcozy offers a wearable breast pump. Cybex features the Priam stroller and Coya travel stroller, and Nex launched the Nex Playground, a motion-controlled gaming console.

articles.title: Personalized perfume by text? I tried it with this scent stylist
articles.author: Lina Abascal
articles.summary: Anna Dorn offers a perfume styling service conducted over text message where she selects and ships eight tiny vials of custom scents to clients for $150. This venture involves curating and providing niche fragrance samples, marking an entry into the personalized fragrance service market.

articles.title: How Gwen Whiting Created a New Category in Cleaning – Then Did It Again
articles.summary: Gwen Whiting, founder of The Laundress, has launched a new members-only, wellness-centered cleaning service called The Fill. The Fill offers curated products, education, and a sense of community, emphasizing personal connection and purpose-driven entrepreneurship.

articles.title: Tradifts AI-powered tool eliminate digital barriers for SMEs, builds e-commerce stores in seconds
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: Tradift, a Nigerian SaaS platform, has launched an AI-powered feature designed to help African small business owners. This new feature allows users to create personalized e-commerce stores rapidly by describing their desired specifications.

articles.title: Amazon 'go-to' gadget loved by shoppers struggling for time
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Nutribullet Blender 900 Series at a reduced price of £75.99. The Nutribullet Blender 900 Series features a 24,000 RPM extractor blade and boasts '50 per cent more power' than the original Nutribullet, and the package contains multiple cups, lids, and a user manual.

articles.title: What to know about the much-anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 on launch day
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 for $450, or $500 with 'Mario Kart World.' The new console features interactive chat and screenshare. Nintendo anticipates selling 15 million Switch 2 consoles in the fiscal year through March 2026.

articles.title: All the retailers Nintendo Switch 2 is still available to order online
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the highly-anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 console, featuring a larger screen, new games, and improved frame rates. The console is available for purchase at various retailers like Amazon, Argos, Currys, EE, Very and Asda, either as a standalone console for £395.99 or in a Mario Kart World bundle for £429.99, with retailers offering various deals and financing options.

articles.title: How to transfer your save files to Switch 1 from Switch 2
articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing the Nintendo Switch 2, a new hybrid handheld console with a custom Nvidia CPU and a 12-core Ampere GPU. The device allows users to transfer data from the original Nintendo Switch via system transfer options, including cloud server storage valid for one year.

articles.title: As the Nintendo Switch 2 launches, these are our hopes and dreams for the console
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Nintendo launches the Nintendo Switch 2 today. The launch follows a period marked by tariffs and price discussions and retailers cancelling pre-orders.

articles.title: This Next Father's Day grooming set is the gift you've been searching for
articles.author: Maz Gould
articles.summary: Next has introduced 'The Well Groomed Essentials Box' for £20, containing grooming products from brands like This Works, Percy Nobleman, Emma Hardie, and Mo Bros, worth over £77. Next has also launched 'The Father's Day Spoil Him Grooming Box' for £22 and a 'Men's Grooming Mystery Box' for £18.

articles.title: '真正的国行'，任天堂香港官方频道入驻B站宣传 Switch 2
articles.author: IT之家
org: IT之家还发现，任天堂香港有限公司官方微博时隔
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially launched its new generation game console, the Switch 2, with Hong Kong versions now available. To promote the new release, Nintendo Hong Kong has joined Bilibili and released promotional videos. Nintendo Hong Kong also reactivated its Weibo account after 5 years to promote in China.

articles.title: WhatsApp might soon let you create custom AI chatbots tailored to your needs: Report
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: WhatsApp is developing and rolling out a "Create AI" feature. This new feature allows users to customize AI-powered chatbots with personalized goals, personality, appearance, and conversational tone. The feature, currently in beta testing, will allow users to share their AI creations with others or keep them private.

articles.title: I'm excited about the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra's possible new cameras, but what I want is an integrated S Pen
articles.author: Lance Ulanoff
articles.summary: Samsung plans to introduce a folding Galaxy Ultra phone, potentially named Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra. This new foldable is expected to feature upgraded camera specifications, matching those of the Galaxy S25 Ultra, including a 200MP main camera and 50MP 5X optical zoom.

articles.title: I tried ChatGPT's new shopping feature – here's what it's like and how to use it
articles.author: Becca Caddy
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced a new shopping feature within ChatGPT that acts as a built-in assistant. This feature helps users to find and compare products by scanning reviews and recommendations. Users can trigger the shopping feature automatically with prompts like "Find me..." or "I'm looking for..." and can click on product suggestions for more details, including images, ratings, and prices.

articles.title: I tested Aldi's 7 new beauty buys all for under £5 – a cult Charlotte Tilbury dupe is back but the blusher was my fave
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Aldi is launching seven new beauty 'dupe' products under £5, including Lacura Lip Balms, Sculpting Bronzing Stick, Watermelon Brightening and Bronzing Serums, Shimmer Hydrating Facial Mist, Blush, Luminous Filter Foundation, and Microblade Effect Pen. Aldi is also launching 'The Chassaux et Fils Rosé' , a dupe of Whispering Angel. These products are intended to offer affordable alternatives to higher-end beauty items.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 games list – everything you can play right now
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2 with a diverse lineup of games. Key titles include Mario Kart World, Cyberpunk 2077, and upgraded versions of The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild and Tears Of The Kingdom. Other companies like Sega, Konami and Level-5 are providing upgraded versions of their games for Switch 2 launch.

articles.title: Newgen Software shares soar 9% on bagging $2.5 million five-year international contract
articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.summary: Newgen Software Technologies secured a $2.5 million contract to supply and implement its Enterprise Workflow and Content Management System. The five-year contract involves licensing, implementation, and support services. Newgen's solutions will be used to drive digital transformation for the overseas client.

articles.title: 📸 Inter's new kit hides a big secret
articles.author: One Football
articles.summary: Inter Milan has launched its new jersey for the upcoming season, featuring innovative technology that molds the iconic black and blue stripes to create the word 'INTER'. The jersey also introduces a Chlorine Blu color for the club's crest, Nike symbol, and sponsors, which will be a key feature in the club's communication. It will debut on June 21 in Seattle against Urawa Red Diamonds.

articles.title: Gmail replies: Google DeepMind working on AI tool to auto-respond in user's writing styles
articles.author: DH Web Desk
articles.summary: Gmail is introducing a new feature in its new-generation app. The application will understand the context of the message and respond in the owner's writing style.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Lava Bold N1 Pro smartphone on June 04, 2025. This budget smartphone features a Li-Ion 5000 mAh battery with 10W wired charging, a 6.67-inch IPS LCD display, and a 50-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s with Snapdragon 8 Elite launched in India, starts from Rs 54,999
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s. The OnePlus 13s features Snapdragon 8 Elite.

articles.title: ⚡Check Hyundai Verna SX+ Price, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor India Limited launched the Hyundai Verna SX+ variant, a compact sedan, with upgrades and improved features. The Verna SX+ is available in both MT and iVT variants.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s First Look: Compact flagship with NO compromises!
articles.summary: OnePlus introduces the OnePlus 13s, a compact flagship smartphone boasting high-end specs. It features a new Plus Key, an advanced cooling system, and unique color options, including a Green Silk edition exclusive to India. The OnePlus 13s aims to provide a powerful and feature-rich experience in a smaller form factor.

articles.title: How Startups Are Using AI to Disrupt Traditional Markets
articles.author: info@firebrandmediainc.com
articles.summary: Several companies are leveraging AI to launch or improve their products and services. Stitch Fix uses algorithms to personalize clothing selections, Intercom and Cresta enhance customer support using AI, and UiPath automates robotic processes. Zebra Medical Vision utilizes AI for medical image analysis, Hopper predicts travel prices with AI, and HeraHaven offers AI companion chatbots, demonstrating the wide range of AI applications in redefining and innovating products and services across industries.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launched in India today: Unveiled with velvet finish, aluminum alloy frame, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, AI call assistant, and more
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13s smartphone in India, featuring a 6.3-inch OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite CPU, and a 50MP primary rear camera. The base model with 12GB RAM and 256GB storage is priced at Rs. 54,999, with sales starting on June 12 through Amazon India, the OnePlus India website, and physical retail locations, along with launch offers like discounts and EMI options.

articles.title: New Look reduces 'beautiful' summer dress to £23
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: New Look is offering a 25% discount on dresses, including the Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, now priced at £22.4. The dress, available in red and black, features short puffy sleeves and ruching at the bodice. Alternative dresses from Dorothy Perkins, Nobody's Child, and Boden are also highlighted.

articles.title: World Environment Day: Gadgets that help you build a healthier home
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Dyson V12s Detect Slim Submarine™ wet and dry vacuum cleaner, priced at INR 55,900, which features a wet roller head, illuminating dust technology, and a hair screw tool. They also launched the Dyson WashG1™ cord-free wet floor cleaner, priced at INR 64,900, which tackles wet and dry debris and can cover up to 3,100 sq. ft. on a single charge. Both products are available at Dyson stores and Dyson.in.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2: What We Need to Know About the Mega Release with AI Power!
articles.author: Akt.
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to debut the Switch 2, which may include AI technology integration and improved graphics. The Switch 2 is expected to be compatible with existing Switch games, and some games may receive free upgrades to take advantage of the new hardware.

articles.title: China rolls out major reforms ahead of gaokao, its national college entrance exam
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Salesforce is rolling out new AI-powered Sales Cloud Einstein features. These features aim to improve sales team efficiency by offering predictive lead scoring and automated task management.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s review: A compact flagship for modern times
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the 13s, a compact smartphone featuring a 6.32-inch screen, a 5850 mAh battery, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 'Elite' chip. The OnePlus 13s has two lenses on the back: a 50-megapixel wide-angle camera and a 50-megapixel telephoto camera with 2x zoom. Priced at Rs 54,999 onwards, it offers a premium build, near-pure Android experience, and impressive battery life, making it a strong contender in the compact flagship category.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 orders are open in the UK as Very, Amazon and Currys restock
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially launched the Nintendo Switch 2 in the UK, with many stores restocking the console. A bundle including the console, Mario Kart World, Joy-Con 2 Wheels, a camera, and a microSD card is available for £546. Nintendo advises users not to remove the protective film on the console screen.

articles.title: VDO.AI introduces interactive In Scroll display ad format for desktop and mobile
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: VDO.AI has launched a new In-Scroll Display Ad Format, designed to enhance user engagement with interactivity and motion, functioning on both desktop and mobile. This ad format features a 50-50 split layout with interactive elements to explore product features and offers a 3D scrolling experience, reportedly increasing engagement rates by over 25%.

articles.title: Adobe launches AI agents for product support and data insights
articles.author: Tom Gosby
articles.summary: Adobe has launched its first set of AI agents, including the Product Support Agent and the Data Insights Agent. The Product Support Agent offers real-time, interactive support for Adobe Experience Platform users, while the Data Insights Agent supports natural language queries for data analysis and visualization within Adobe Customer Journey Analytics.

articles.title: AI upstart Manus starts text-to-video service to take on OpenAI
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: Manus has introduced a text-to-video generation feature that allows users to create videos from text instructions in minutes. Paid subscribers gain early access to this feature before it is rolled out for free to all users. This launch puts Manus in competition with companies like OpenAI, Alibaba, and Tencent in the growing text-to-video market.

articles.title: ⚡OpenAI Has 3 Million Paying ChatGPT Business Users
articles.summary: ChatGPT has launched an expansive set of new AI-powered workplace products. This introduction addresses the increasing demand from businesses seeking AI solutions to improve productivity, efficiency, and strategic capabilities.

articles.title: Embodied AI robots with ‘common sense' will be poised to tackle complex tasks: AI² Robotics
articles.summary: AI² Robotics, led by Gou Yandong, is developing next-generation embodied robots. These robots are positioned to differentiate themselves from current offerings. The advancement suggests potential for wider commercial applications of AI² Robotics' embodied robots.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 stock live: Where to buy, including Amazon, GAME, Argos and EE
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 today. Retailers including EE, Argos, Amazon, and Currys are launching deals alongside the product release.

articles.title: NK Retail Partners with NuORDER by Lightspeed to Digitize Buying Process, Improve Customer Experience
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NK Retail has partnered with NuORDER by Lightspeed to digitize its merchandising and buying process using the NuORDER platform. This implementation aims to streamline operations, allowing NK Retail to focus on enhancing in-store customer experiences by making strategic buying and assortment planning decisions based on real-time data. The NuORDER Assortments feature enables buyers to write orders 60% faster and offers robust reporting for improved merchandising.

articles.title: Here comes the sunscreens: The new guard of SPF
articles.author: Louisa Lim
articles.summary: Lancaster is launching its suncare line in Singapore, featuring its signature Full Light Technology. Shiseido has introduced its Global Suncare range with SynchroShield Technology. The Ordinary has launched the UV Filters SPF45 Serum, and Re:erth has introduced Radiance Defense SPF 50+ PA++++.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Release Date, Price & Games – All Updates!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nintendo is anticipated to launch the Nintendo Switch 2, building upon the hybrid model of the original Switch. The new console is expected to have significant graphical upgrades and potentially offer cloud gaming integration. Nintendo is also likely to expand its Nintendo Switch Online subscription service with expanded tiers.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics teases new foldable smartphone ahead of July unpacking event
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has teased the launch of its next-generation foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, promising larger displays, upgraded camera systems, and smarter AI capabilities. The new devices, expected to be unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event in July, will feature AI-powered features like live translation and AI-assisted photo editing, aiming to redefine the Galaxy Ultra series experience.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Price In India, Release Date, Design, Camera, Colors, Specs And More: All Leaks
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus Nord 5 smartphone, a mid-range device potentially rebranded from the OnePlus Ace 5 Ultra. Expected features include a 6.83-inch OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, up to 16GB RAM, 1TB storage, a 6,700mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and a dual rear camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. The India launch is expected later this month or early July 2025, with a price range between Rs 30,000 and Rs 35,000.

articles.title: Mobile UI UX Design Services Creating With XAutonomous
articles.summary: xautonomous specializes in mobile UI/UX design services, offering user-centric solutions. Their services include research, wireframing, UI design, prototyping, and usability testing.  They helped a fintech startup redesign their app, leading to a 40% increase in session duration and a 30% reduction in user drop-off during sign-up, highlighting the impact of their services.

articles.title: Lg's 10 Million-selling Cutting-edge Oled and Qned Tv Lineup Set to Redefine Home Entertainment in the Gcc
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its 2025 OLED and QNED TV lineup, featuring models like M5, G5, C5, and B5 series. The new TVs boast advanced α AI processors, the webOS 25 platform, and offer improved picture quality, sound, and gaming features, including the industry's first 4K 165Hz VRR on the G5 series, as well as wireless audio and video capabilities for the OLED M5.

articles.title: 36 Cult-Favorite Beauty Products That Keep Big Promises
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream that contains aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to hydrate, tighten, and exfoliate skin. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder that absorbs oil and blurs pores. Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, which is for face coverage and a protective setting powder.

articles.title: 30 Problem-Solving Products You'll Be Relieved To Have
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced new "Sqeezy" sponge set. Ocusoft launched Original Foaming Eyelid Cleanser. Lumify released Eye Drops for redness reduction. Tower 28 uses same ingredient as Briotech spray to calm irritated skin. Shark Tank launched a migraine relief beanie.

articles.title: The countdown is over! Order the Nintendo Switch 2 now before it sells out!
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: Nintendo has officially released the Nintendo Switch 2, a successor to the original Switch, featuring a larger 1080p screen, 4K resolution support, screen sharing capabilities via a C button, and an adjustable stand. Available at major retailers like Walmart, the Nintendo Switch 2 retails for $449.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launch LIVE: best deals at Argos, EE, Currys and Amazon
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to their 2017 portable console. The new console features performance and screen size upgrades, along with exclusive new games. A new Mario Kart game is also released, and upgrades are available for titles like Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Super Mario Odyssey.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launch LIVE: stock updates, where to buy and cheapest deals
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to its 2017 portable console, featuring performance and screen size upgrades. The launch also includes the release of a new Mario Kart game and upgraded versions of existing titles like Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Super Mario Odyssey. Securing a pre-order has been challenging due to limited stock availability.

articles.title: Shaoxing's steamed buns debut in Los Angeles
articles.summary: NeZha Dumpling, a brand from Shengzhou, opened its first overseas store in Pasadena, California, on June 1. The store offers classic Shengzhou pork steamed buns and innovative options with adjusted recipes to suit local tastes.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Unveils 60cl Bottle, Assures Consumers of more refreshment
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Nigeria has launched a 60cl bottle of Coca-Cola. The new bottle size aims to offer consumers more refreshment and opportunities to share at the same price.

articles.title: 42 Little Gifts To Treat Yourself To If It Hasn't Been Your Day, Your Week, Your Month, Or Even Your Year
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: OXO introduced the compact Brew Rapid Brewer for making cold brew or hot coffee. Sol de Janeiro launched Cheirosa 59 Hair & Body Perfume Mist. Wonderskin released Wonder Blading One Step Lip Stain Masque and Menore launched Slippers featuring squishy bottoms.

articles.title: Aldi: road changes planned after opening of new store in Lytham
articles.author: Local Democracy Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi opened a new store on Preston Road in Lytham. Following the opening, a new 'toucan crossing' will be installed to provide a safe crossing point for pedestrians and cyclists. The cost of the crossing will be covered by Aldi as part of an agreement reached under the planning permission granted for the store.

articles.title: 27 Makeup And Skincare Products For Beauty Beginners
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: NYX launched Shine Loud liquid lipstick that is an all-day liquid lippie with deeply pigmented color and high-shine gloss. Haus Labs by Lady Gaga launched Hy-Power Pigment Paint designed to be versatile for eyes, lips, cheeks, and even body art. Glossier launched Cloud Paint, a gel-cream blush that's cruelty-free and buildable. Rare Beauty launched Soft Pinch liquid blush, and 4-in-1 priming and setting spray. Alleyoop launched Pen Pal, a 4-in-1 makeup pen.

articles.title: Unleashing new quality productive forces
articles.author: 许嘉怡
articles.summary: Henkel acquired Suzhou Boke to enhance manufacturing, Bosch is launching innovations like AI-powered steam ovens and ADAS, FedEx introduced the Collaborative Shipping Tool and Picture Proof of Delivery, and Aveva focuses on Industrial Intelligence solutions for various sectors. These companies are adapting to China's evolving market by introducing new products and services.

articles.title: Switch2発売日 SNS上の反応 - Yahoo!ニュース
articles.summary: The search query "Switch2 発売" indicates information being sought about the launch of a product called "Switch2". Real-time search results on Yahoo suggest recent information being made available regarding this product launch.

articles.title: N优优绿能涨逾67%，N中策涨逾22%
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: On June 5th, 'N优优绿能' stock increased by over 67%, and 'N中策' stock increased by over 22% upon their listing.

articles.title: FeelNeedy: New brand wants every pet to feel loved
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: FeelNeedy, a pet care brand, offers a range of products designed to enhance daily life for pets and their owners. These products include smart drinking fountains, automated feeders, self-cleaning litter boxes, grooming tools, nail grinders, bubble machines, and enriching pet toys which are engineered to support hydration, hygiene, enrichment, and entertainment.

articles.title: Next shoppers bag every colour of £38 dress that 'covers the tummy'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next offers the £38 Jersey Waisted Summer Dress in multiple colors and petite/regular sizes, featuring a square neckline and pockets. Complementing it are the £28 Forever Comfort Point Toe Low Slingback Kitten Heels. Nobody's Child presents the Colorado Midi Dress for £60-£89 in various colors, while New Look has the £45.99 Square Neck Midi Dress in black and red.

articles.title: SHOWDOWN: Coastal Carolina's UNSTOPPABLE Winning Streak Meets Auburn's SEC Pedigree
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers a dedicated app, enabling users to stream WeAreIowa content on their mobile phones. The WeAreIowa app is a new service.

articles.title: FeelNeedy: Because Every Pet Deserves to Feel Loved
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: FeelNeedy offers a diverse range of products designed to enhance daily life for pets and their owners. Their products include smart drinking fountains, automated feeders, self-cleaning litter boxes, grooming tools, nail grinders, bubble machines, and enriching pet toys. These products aim to support hydration, hygiene, enrichment, and entertainment for pets.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 console review: I tried it before it went on sale — is ...
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2. Initial previews indicate positive reception of the next-generation console.

articles.title: Where To Buy The Nintendo Switch 2 Before It Sells Out
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2 console. The article provides information on where consumers can purchase the new console.

articles.title: Mute the noise with these new noise-cancelling earbuds with 12 hours battery life
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Soundcore unveiled its Liberty 5 earbuds at an immersive launch event. Attendees experienced the Liberty 5's sound quality in real-world simulations, including a cafe zone and airplane simulation.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 launch mania makes me miss the early iPhone launch days
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: A visit to the Nintendo Store in Manhattan explores the anticipation surrounding the potential launch of the Nintendo Switch 2 console.

articles.title: Game of the Year 2024 Astro Bot is Getting New Levels Next Month
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Team Asobi is introducing five new challenge levels to Astro Bot in July. This addition expands the existing features and offers players new experiences within the game.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Live stock updates as console launches
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 console. The article provides information on how to purchase the new console.

articles.title: The Best Nintendo Switch 2 Gaming Accessories, From the Pro Controller to the Joy-Con 2 Wheel
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Nintendo is associated with 'Nintendo Switch 2'. The introduction of 'Nintendo Switch 2' is prompting consideration of compatible gaming accessories.

articles.title: Samsung Signals Major New Galaxy Z Fold 7 Phone Upgrade
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which is teased to have a significantly larger cover screen closer to the size of a standard smartphone. The new foldable phone is also expected to feature improved cameras to address previous user concerns. The company implies a potential renaming and marketing boost reflecting new hardware credentials.

articles.title: Here Are The Best Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Games You Can Buy
articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2. While facing limited advertising and review units, the system has already sold out. Despite a limited number of entirely new launch titles, several existing games have been modified or upgraded to be compatible with the Switch 2.

articles.title: Cracking The Code: How AI Revolutionizes Software Development
articles.author: Clint Boulton
articles.summary: Dell and NVIDIA have created the Dell AI Factory with NVIDIA to help organizations leverage AI for software development. The AI Factory delivers capabilities to accelerate AI-powered use cases, integrate data and workflows, and enable the design of AI journeys for scalable outcomes. The AI Factory includes NVIDIA accelerated computing, software, networking technology and Dell servers, storage and professional services.

articles.title: What to know about the much-anticipated Nintendo Switch 2 on launch day
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 in stores.

articles.title: Nutella unveils its first-ever new flavor in 60 years: Here's when it will hit U.S. shelves
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nutella launched its first-ever new flavor in six decades. The new flavor combines Nutella cocoa hazelnut spread with roasted peanuts.

articles.title: Switch 2 Stock Tracker: Select In-Store Availability, Online Target Restock Tomorrow
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Nintendo launched its highly-anticipated handheld device. Retailers are being monitored to ensure availability.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s Blends OnePlus X Pocketability With OnePlus 13 Power
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OnePlus is introducing the 13s, a new compact phone. This phone offers flagship performance and a large battery in a smaller size.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Can't be 100 Percent Completed Without Extra Accessories
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched the Nintendo Switch 2. A launch game for the console, Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, requires additional accessory purchases for complete gameplay.

articles.title: Nintendo Releases the Switch 2: Everything You Need to Know About Where to Buy the Gaming Console
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: Nintendo has released its next-generation console, the Switch 2. It is available for purchase now.

articles.title: Timbaland's New Artist Is Young, Photogenic — and Not Human
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: A new start-up, launched by the producer, is introducing TaTa, an AI-generated "artist."

articles.title: It's no 'poor man's Defender': New Hyundai Santa Fe lands in SA, with hybrid power
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Hyundai has launched the all-new Santa Fe in South Africa. The new Santa Fe features a boxy design. The single derivative available is priced at R1,249,000.

articles.title: Nintendo fans have finally got their hands on the Switch 2: 'This thing is incredible'
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2 today. The Nintendo Switch 2 was announced earlier this year in a hardware-focused teaser trailer before more details were revealed in April.

articles.title: ValGenesis Launches Smart GxP™ as First AI-Enabled Platform to Unify Validation and Process Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ValGenesis, Inc. launched ValGenesis Smart GxP™, a digital validation lifecycle management solution. The company positions itself as a global innovator in the field.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 launch day live
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 is released today after months of speculation.

articles.title: Beauty buffs insist they've found the 'game changer for fuller, thicker hair'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A new shampoo provides users with fuller, thicker, and more voluminous hair, resulting in a game-changing effect for hair appearance.

articles.title: Costco testing 'scan-and-go' checkout technology
articles.summary: Costco is testing 'scan-and-go' checkout technology. The aim is to improve the shopping experience. Competitors Sam's Club and BJ's already offer similar features.

articles.title: Katalog Promo Alfamart Beauty Fair Hari Ini, Idul Adha Makin Glowing!
articles.summary: Alfamart is running a Beauty Fair and Baby Diapers Fair promotion from June 1-15, 2025, offering discounted prices on beauty products like Nivea, Wardah, and Shinzui, as well as baby diapers from brands like MamyPoko and Baby Happy. Discounts reach up to 45% for beauty products and 50% for baby diapers.

articles.title: How to upgrade Dad's grooming game for Father's Day
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Walgreens is introducing a "Men's Zone" in nearly 8,000 stores nationwide. This dedicated space will feature an assortment of men's grooming and skin care products from brands like Harry's, Dr. Squatch, Cremo and Mando. Walgreens also offers 1-Hour Delivery for convenience.
